title: æ–¯å·´æ‹‰ç¨€
text:
callout






note with Title



Note that there are five types of callouts, including: note, warning, important, tip, and caution.








Tip with Title



This is an example of a callout with a title.








Expand To Learn About Collapse





This is an example of a â€˜foldedâ€™ caution callout that can be expanded by the user. You can use collapse="true" to collapse it by default or collapse="false" to make a collapsible callout that is expanded by default.









PowerShell Note



Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the cardâ€™s content.
